/*
--------------------
1. ICONS
--------------------
*/
/*
    Add icon library/font url here
    copy the css here at the end of DEV phase
*/
@font-face {
  font-family: 'icomoon';
  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: normal; }

[class^="icon-"], [class*=" icon-"] {
  /* use !important to prevent issues with browser extensions that change fonts */
  font-family: 'icomoon' !important;
  speak: none;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: normal;
  font-variant: normal;
  text-transform: none;
  line-height: 1;
  /* Better Font Rendering =========== */
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; }

/* common */
.icon, .iconInline {
  /*transition*/
  /*-webkit-transform:translate3d(0,0,0);*/
  -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
  -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
  -o-transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
  transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
  text-decoration: none; }

/* iconInline */
.iconInline {
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  padding: 0 5px;
  margin: 0 0;
  vertical-align: middle;
  line-height: 1em; }

.iconInline.left {
  padding-left: 0;
  text-align: left; }

.iconInline.right {
  padding-right: 0;
  text-align: right; }

/*
--------------------
1. MIXINS
--------------------
*/
.visuallyhidden, .sr-only, .sq-form-question-note, .related-panel .image__caption, .related-panel .images__text {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px; }

.visuallyhidden.focusable:active, .focusable.sr-only:active,
.visuallyhidden.focusable:focus, .focusable.sr-only:focus {
  clip: auto;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: visible;
  position: static;
  width: auto; }

.clearfix {
  *zoom: 1; }
  .clearfix:before, .clearfix:after {
    content: '';
    display: table;
    line-height: 0; }
  .clearfix:after {
    clear: both; }

.hidden {
  display: none !important;
  visibility: hidden; }

.invisible {
  visibility: hidden; }

.pull-left {
  float: left; }

img.pull-left {
  margin-right: 1em; }

.pull-right {
  float: right; }

img.pull-right {
  margin-left: 1em; }

.video-container {
  position: relative;
  padding-bottom: 56.25%;
  padding-top: 30px;
  height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-bottom: 1em; }

.video-container iframe,
.video-container object,
.video-container embed {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%; }

body .mobile-hide {
  display: none; }

/*
--------------------
    MEDIUM
--------------------
*/
@media screen and (min-width: 47rem) {
  body .mobile-hide {
    display: inherit; }
  body .tablet-hide {
    display: none; } }

/*
--------------------
    LARGE
--------------------
*/
@media screen and (min-width: 75rem) {
  body .tablet-hide {
    display: inherit; }
  body .desktop-hide {
    display: none; } }

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: border-box; }

html {
  font-family: sans-serif;
  line-height: 1.15;
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  -ms-overflow-style: scrollbar;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); }

@-ms-viewport {
  width: device-width; }

article, aside, dialog, figcaption, figure, footer, header, hgroup, main, nav, section {
  display: block; }

body {
  margin: 0;
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: normal;
  line-height: 1.4;
  color: #000000;
  text-align: left;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  /* Better Font Rendering */
  text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; }

[tabindex="-1"]:focus {
  outline: none !important; }

hr {
  box-sizing: content-box;
  height: 0;
  overflow: visible; }

p {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 1rem; }

abbr[title],
abbr[data-original-title] {
  text-decoration: underline;
  text-decoration: underline dotted;
  cursor: help;
  border-bottom: 0; }

address {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  font-style: normal;
  line-height: inherit; }

ol,
ul,
dl {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 1rem; }

ol ol,
ul ul,
ol ul,
ul ol {
  margin-bottom: 0; }

dt {
  font-weight: normal; }

dd {
  margin-bottom: .5rem;
  margin-left: 0; }

blockquote {
  margin: 0 0 1rem; }

dfn {
  font-style: italic; }

b,
strong {
  font-weight: bolder; }

small {
  font-size: 80%; }

sub,
sup {
  position: relative;
  font-size: 75%;
  line-height: 0;
  vertical-align: baseline; }

sub {
  bottom: -.25em; }

sup {
  top: -.5em; }

a {
  color: #383838;
  text-decoration: underline;
  background-color: transparent;
  -webkit-text-decoration-skip: objects; }
  a:hover {
    color: #4a4a4a;
    text-decoration: underline; }

a:not([href]):not([tabindex]) {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none; }
  a:not([href]):not([tabindex]):focus {
    color: inherit;
    text-decoration: none; }
  a:not([href]):not([tabindex]):hover {
    color: inherit;
    text-decoration: none; }
  a:not([href]):not([tabindex]):focus {
    outline: 0; }

pre,
code,
kbd,
samp {
  font-family: monospace, monospace;
  font-size: 1em; }

pre {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  overflow: auto; }

figure {
  margin: 0 0 1rem; }

img {
  vertical-align: middle;
  border-style: none; }

svg:not(:root) {
  overflow: hidden; }

a,
area,
button,
[role="button"],
input:not([type=range]),
label,
select,
summary,
textarea {
  touch-action: manipulation; }

input::-ms-clear {
  display: none;
  width: 0;
  height: 0; }

input::-ms-reveal {
  display: none;
  width: 0;
  height: 0; }

input {
  -moz-appearance: none;
  -webkit-appearance: none; }

table {
  border-collapse: collapse; }

caption {
  padding-top: 0.5rem;
  padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
  color: #e4e0da;
  text-align: left;
  caption-side: bottom; }

th {
  text-align: inherit; }

label {
  display: inline-block;
  margin-bottom: .5rem; }

button:focus {
  outline: 1px dotted;
  outline: 5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color; }

input,
button,
select,
optgroup,
textarea {
  margin: 0;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
  line-height: inherit; }

button,
input {
  overflow: visible; }

button,
select {
  text-transform: none; }

button,
html [type="button"],
[type="reset"],
[type="submit"] {
  -webkit-appearance: button; }

button::-moz-focus-inner,
[type="button"]::-moz-focus-inner,
[type="reset"]::-moz-focus-inner,
[type="submit"]::-moz-focus-inner {
  padding: 0;
  border-style: none; }

input[type="radio"],
input[type="checkbox"] {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 0; }

input[type="date"],
input[type="time"],
input[type="datetime-local"],
input[type="month"] {
  -webkit-appearance: listbox; }

textarea {
  overflow: auto;
  resize: vertical; }

fieldset {
  min-width: 0;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  border: 0; }

legend {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin-bottom: .5rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  line-height: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  white-space: normal; }

progress {
  vertical-align: baseline; }

[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,
[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {
  height: auto; }

[type="search"] {
  outline-offset: -2px;
  -webkit-appearance: none; }

[type="search"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,
[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration {
  -webkit-appearance: none; }

::-webkit-file-upload-button {
  font: inherit;
  -webkit-appearance: button; }

output {
  display: inline-block; }

summary {
  display: list-item; }

template {
  display: none; }

[hidden] {
  display: none !important; }

    Any global CSS can go here - do not overload it

/* Right-align right-to-left content */
*[dir=rtl] {
  text-align: right; }

/* 404 page */
.content-viewport .campaign-heading {
  font-size: 1.6875rem;
  line-height: 1.8125rem;
  font-weight: 200;
  color: #E30000;
  margin: 1.5rem 0 0.75rem 0;
  text-align: center; }

.content-viewport .campaign-sub-heading {
  color: #000000;
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.0625rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  line-height: 1.375rem;
  margin: 0;
  text-align: center; }

.content-viewport .page-404 {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center; }

.content-viewport .page-404__image {
  max-width: 10.9375rem;
  flex-basis: 10.9375rem; }

.content-viewport .page-404__content h1 {
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 200;
  line-height: 28px;
  margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
  text-align: center; }

.content-viewport .page-404__content span {
  color: #E30000; }

.content-viewport .page-404__content p {
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  margin: 0; }

.content-viewport .page-404__content ul {
  margin: 0.875rem 0; }

.content-viewport .page-404__content li {
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-left: 0; }
  .content-viewport .page-404__content li::before {
    width: 1rem;
    margin-left: -1rem; }

--------------------
    MEDIUM
--------------------
*/

    line-height: 1.75rem;
    margin: 0 0 1.25rem 0; }

    max-width: 15.4375rem;
    order: 2; }

    flex-basis: calc(100% - 247px);
    max-width: calc(100% - 247px);
    order: 1; }

    font-size: 2.5rem;
    line-height: 49px;
    text-align: left; }

    font-size: 0.9375rem; } }

    LARGE

    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between; }

    flex-basis: 25.6875rem;
    max-width: 25.6875rem; }

    flex-basis: 39.8125rem;
    max-width: 39.8125rem; }

/*

1. GRID

/*
  Bootstrap 4 12 Column flex grid - set the variables in variables.scss
  Use .container or .container-fluid to wrap .row and .col-xx
*/
@-ms-viewport {
  width: device-width; }

html {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  -ms-overflow-style: scrollbar; }

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: inherit; }

.container {
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
  padding-left: 12px;
  padding-right: 12px;
  width: 100%; }

@media (min-width: 47rem) {
  .container {
    padding-left: 18px;
    padding-right: 18px; } }

@media (min-width: 75rem) {
  .container {
    max-width: 75rem;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px; } }

.container-fluid {
  width: 100%;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  padding-left: 12px;
  padding-right: 12px; }

@media (min-width: 47rem) {
  .container-fluid {
    padding-left: 18px;
    padding-right: 18px; } }

@media (min-width: 75rem) {
  .container-fluid {
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px; } }

.row {
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-right: -12px;
  margin-left: -12px; }

@media (min-width: 47rem) {
  .row {
    margin-left: -18px;
    margin-right: -18px; } }

@media (min-width: 75rem) {
  .row {
    margin-left: -10px;
    margin-right: -10px; } }

.no-gutters {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-left: 0; }

.no-gutters &gt; .col,
.no-gutters &gt; [class*="col-"] {
  padding-right: 0;
  padding-left: 0; }

.col-1, .col-2, .col-3, .col-4, .col-5, .col-6, .col-7, .col-8, .col-9, .col-10, .col-11, .col-12, .col,
.col-auto, .col-sm-1, .col-sm-2, .col-sm-3, .col-sm-4, .col-sm-5, .col-sm-6, .col-sm-7, .col-sm-8, .col-sm-9, .col-sm-10, .col-sm-11, .col-sm-12, .col-sm,

.col-xl-auto {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;

  padding-right: 12px;
  padding-left: 12px; }

@media screen and (min-width: 47rem) {
  .col-1, .col-2, .col-3, .col-4, .col-5, .col-6, .col-7, .col-8, .col-9, .col-10, .col-11, .col-12, .col,

    padding-left: 18px; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 75rem) {
  .col-1, .col-2, .col-3, .col-4, .col-5, .col-6, .col-7, .col-8, .col-9, .col-10, .col-11, .col-12, .col,

  .col-md-auto, .col-lg-1, .col-lg-2, .col-lg-3, .col-lg-4, .col-lg-5, .col-lg-6, .col-lg-7, .col-lg-8, .col-lg-9, .col-lg-10, .col-lg-11, .col-lg-12, .col-lg,
  .col-lg-auto, .col-xl-1, .col-xl-2, .col-xl-3, .col-xl-4, .col-xl-5, .col-xl-6, .col-xl-7, .col-xl-8, .col-xl-9, .col-xl-10, .col-xl-11, .col-xl-12, .col-xl,
  .col-xl-auto {
    padding-right: 10px;
    padding-left: 10px; } }

.col {
  -ms-flex-preferred-size: 0;
  flex-basis: 0;
  -ms-flex-positive: 1;
  flex-grow: 1;
  max-width: 100%; }

.col-auto {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 auto;
  flex: 0 0 auto;
  width: auto;
  max-width: none; }

.col-1 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 8.333333%;
  flex: 0 0 8.333333%;
  max-width: 8.333333%; }

.col-2 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 16.666667%;
  flex: 0 0 16.666667%;
  max-width: 16.666667%; }

.col-3 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 25%;
  flex: 0 0 25%;
  max-width: 25%; }

  -ms-flex: 0 0 33.333333%;

  max-width: 33.333333%; }

  flex: 0 0 41.666667%;
  max-width: 41.666667%; }

  -ms-flex: 0 0 50%;
  flex: 0 0 50%;
  max-width: 50%; }

  -ms-flex: 0 0 58.333333%;
  flex: 0 0 58.333333%;
  max-width: 58.333333%; }

.col-8 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 66.666667%;

  max-width: 66.666667%; }

  -ms-flex: 0 0 75%;
  flex: 0 0 75%;

  flex: 0 0 91.666667%;

  flex: 0 0 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

  -ms-flex-order: 1;
  order: 1; }

  -ms-flex-order: 2;
  order: 2; }

  order: 3; }

  -ms-flex-order: 4;
  order: 4; }

.order-5 {
  -ms-flex-order: 5;
  order: 5; }

  order: 6; }

.order-7 {
  -ms-flex-order: 7;
  order: 7; }

.order-8 {
  -ms-flex-order: 8;
  order: 8; }

.order-9 {
  -ms-flex-order: 9;
  order: 9; }

.order-10 {
  -ms-flex-order: 10;
  order: 10; }

.order-11 {
  -ms-flex-order: 11;
  order: 11; }

.order-12 {
  -ms-flex-order: 12;
  order: 12; }

.col-sm {
  -ms-flex-preferred-size: 0;
  flex-basis: 0;
  -ms-flex-positive: 1;
  flex-grow: 1;
  max-width: 100%; }

.col-sm-auto {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 auto;
  flex: 0 0 auto;
  width: auto;
  max-width: none; }

.col-sm-1 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 8.333333%;
  flex: 0 0 8.333333%;
  max-width: 8.333333%; }

.col-sm-2 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 16.666667%;
  flex: 0 0 16.666667%;
  max-width: 16.666667%; }

.col-sm-3 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 25%;
  flex: 0 0 25%;
  max-width: 25%; }

.col-sm-4 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
  flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
  max-width: 33.333333%; }

.col-sm-5 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 41.666667%;
  flex: 0 0 41.666667%;
  max-width: 41.666667%; }

.col-sm-6 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 50%;
  flex: 0 0 50%;
  max-width: 50%; }

.col-sm-7 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 58.333333%;
  flex: 0 0 58.333333%;
  max-width: 58.333333%; }

.col-sm-8 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 66.666667%;
  flex: 0 0 66.666667%;
  max-width: 66.666667%; }

.col-sm-9 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 75%;
  flex: 0 0 75%;
  max-width: 75%; }

.col-sm-10 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 83.333333%;
  flex: 0 0 83.333333%;
  max-width: 83.333333%; }

.col-sm-11 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 91.666667%;
  flex: 0 0 91.666667%;
  max-width: 91.666667%; }

.col-sm-12 {
  -ms-flex: 0 0 100%;
  flex: 0 0 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

.order-sm-1 {
  -ms-flex-order: 1;
  order: 1; }

.order-sm-2 {
  -ms-flex-order: 2;
  order: 2; }

.order-sm-3 {
  -ms-flex-order: 3;
  order: 3; }

.order-sm-4 {
  -ms-flex-order: 4;
  order: 4; }

.order-sm-5 {
  -ms-flex-order: 5;
  order: 5; }

.order-sm-6 {
  -ms-flex-order: 6;
  order: 6; }

  -ms-flex-order: 7;
  order: 7; }

  order: 8; }

  order: 10; }

  order: 12; }

  -ms-flex-direction: row !important;
  flex-direction: row !important; }

  -ms-flex-direction: column !important;
  flex-direction: column !important; }

  -ms-flex-direction: row-reverse !important;
  flex-direction: row-reverse !important; }

  -ms-flex-direction: column-reverse !important;
  flex-direction: column-reverse !important; }

.flex-wrap {
  -ms-flex-wrap: wrap !important;
  flex-wrap: wrap !important; }

.flex-nowrap {
  -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap !important;
  flex-wrap: nowrap !important; }

.flex-wrap-reverse {
  -ms-flex-wrap: wrap-reverse !important;
  flex-wrap: wrap-reverse !important; }

.justify-content-start {
  -ms-flex-pack: start !important;
  justify-content: flex-start !important; }

.justify-content-end {
  -ms-flex-pack: end !important;
  justify-content: flex-end !important; }

.justify-content-center {
  -ms-flex-pack: center !important;
  justify-content: center !important; }

.justify-content-between {
  -ms-flex-pack: justify !important;
  justify-content: space-between !important; }

.justify-content-around {
  -ms-flex-pack: distribute !important;
  justify-content: space-around !important; }

.align-items-start {
  -ms-flex-align: start !important;
  align-items: flex-start !important; }

.align-items-end {
  -ms-flex-align: end !important;
  align-items: flex-end !important; }

  -ms-flex-align: center !important;
  align-items: center !important; }

  align-items: stretch !important; }

    align-content: flex-end !important; }

    -ms-flex-line-pack: center !important;
    align-content: center !important; }
  .align-content-lg-between {
    -ms-flex-line-pack: justify !important;
    align-content: space-between !important; }
  .align-content-lg-around {
    -ms-flex-line-pack: distribute !important;
    align-content: space-around !important; }
  .align-content-lg-stretch {
    -ms-flex-line-pack: stretch !important;
    align-content: stretch !important; }

    -ms-flex-item-align: auto !important;
    align-self: auto !important; }
  .align-self-lg-start {
    -ms-flex-item-align: start !important;
    align-self: flex-start !important; }
  .align-self-lg-end {
    -ms-flex-item-align: end !important;
    align-self: flex-end !important; }
  .align-self-lg-center {
    -ms-flex-item-align: center !important;
    align-self: center !important; }
  .align-self-lg-baseline {
    -ms-flex-item-align: baseline !important;
    align-self: baseline !important; }
  .align-self-lg-stretch {
    -ms-flex-item-align: stretch !important;
    align-self: stretch !important; } }

/*# sourceMappingURL=bootstrap-grid.css.map */
/*
 * Table of Contents
 *  
 *  CSS ANIMATION
 *  
 *
 */
/*
--------------------
1. CSS ANIMATION
--------------------
*/
/*!
 * animate.css -http://daneden.me/animate
 * Version - 3.5.2
 * Licensed under the MIT license - http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
 *
 * Copyright (c) 2017 Daniel Eden
 */
.animated {
  animation-duration: 1s;
  animation-fill-mode: both; }

.animated.infinite {
  animation-iteration-count: infinite; }

.animated.hinge {
  animation-duration: 2s; }

.animated.flipOutX,
.animated.flipOutY,
.animated.bounceIn,
.animated.bounceOut {
  animation-duration: .75s; }

@keyframes bounce {
  from, 20%, 53%, 80%, to {
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }
  40%, 43% {
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0); }
  70% {
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0); }
  90% {
    transform: translate3d(0, -4px, 0); } }

.bounce {
  animation-name: bounce;
  transform-origin: center bottom; }

@keyframes flash {
  from, 50%, to {
    opacity: 1; }
  25%, 75% {
    opacity: 0; } }

.flash {
  animation-name: flash; }

/* originally authored by Nick Pettit - https://github.com/nickpettit/glide */
@keyframes pulse {
  from {
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); }
  50% {
    transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05); }
  to {
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); } }

.pulse {
  animation-name: pulse; }

@keyframes rubberBand {
  from {
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); }
  30% {
    transform: scale3d(1.25, 0.75, 1); }
  40% {
    transform: scale3d(0.75, 1.25, 1); }
  50% {
    transform: scale3d(1.15, 0.85, 1); }
  65% {
    transform: scale3d(0.95, 1.05, 1); }
  75% {
    transform: scale3d(1.05, 0.95, 1); }
  to {
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); } }

@keyframes shake {
  from, to {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }
  10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 90% {
    transform: translate3d(-10px, 0, 0); }
  20%, 40%, 60%, 80% {
    transform: translate3d(10px, 0, 0); } }

  animation-name: shake; }

@keyframes headShake {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0); }
  6.5% {
    transform: translateX(-6px) rotateY(-9deg); }
  18.5% {
    transform: translateX(5px) rotateY(7deg); }
  31.5% {
    transform: translateX(-3px) rotateY(-5deg); }
  43.5% {
    transform: translateX(2px) rotateY(3deg); }
  50% {
    transform: translateX(0); } }

  animation-timing-function: ease-in-out;
  animation-name: headShake; }

  80% {

@keyframes tada {
  from {
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); }
  10%, 20% {
    transform: scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 0.9) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, -3deg); }
  30%, 50%, 70%, 90% {
    transform: scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, 3deg); }
  40%, 60%, 80% {
    transform: scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, -3deg); }
  to {
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); } }

  animation-name: tada; }

  from {
    transform: none; }
  15% {
    transform: translate3d(-25%, 0, 0) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, -5deg); }
  30% {
    transform: translate3d(20%, 0, 0) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, 3deg); }
  45% {
    transform: translate3d(-15%, 0, 0) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, -3deg); }
  60% {
    transform: translate3d(10%, 0, 0) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, 2deg); }
  75% {
    transform: translate3d(-5%, 0, 0) rotate3d(0, 0, 1, -1deg); }
  to {
    transform: none; } }

  animation-name: wobble; }

  from, 11.1%, to {
    transform: none; }
  22.2% {
    transform: skewX(-12.5deg) skewY(-12.5deg); }
  33.3% {
    transform: skewX(6.25deg) skewY(6.25deg); }
  44.4% {
    transform: skewX(-3.125deg) skewY(-3.125deg); }
  55.5% {
    transform: skewX(1.5625deg) skewY(1.5625deg); }
  66.6% {
    transform: skewX(-0.78125deg) skewY(-0.78125deg); }
  77.7% {
    transform: skewX(0.39062deg) skewY(0.39062deg); }
  88.8% {
    transform: skewX(-0.19531deg) skewY(-0.19531deg); } }

  animation-name: jello;
  transform-origin: center; }

@keyframes bounceIn {
  from, 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, to {
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale3d(0.3, 0.3, 0.3); }
  20% {
    transform: scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1.1); }
  40% {
    transform: scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 0.9); }
  60% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(1.03, 1.03, 1.03); }
  80% {
    transform: scale3d(0.97, 0.97, 0.97); }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); } }

.bounceIn {
  animation-name: bounceIn; }

@keyframes bounceInDown {
  from, 60%, 75%, 90%, to {
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1); }
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translate3d(0, -3000px, 0); }
  60% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translate3d(0, 25px, 0); }
  75% {
    transform: translate3d(0, -10px, 0); }
  90% {
    transform: translate3d(0, 5px, 0); }
  to {
    transform: none; } }

@keyframes flip {
  from {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, -360deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-out; }
  40% {
    transform: perspective(400px) translate3d(0, 0, 150px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, -190deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-out; }
  50% {
    transform: perspective(400px) translate3d(0, 0, 150px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, -170deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in; }
  80% {
    transform: perspective(400px) scale3d(0.95, 0.95, 0.95);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in; }
  to {
    transform: perspective(400px);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in; } }

.animated.flip {
  -webkit-backface-visibility: visible;
  backface-visibility: visible;
  animation-name: flip; }

@keyframes flipInX {
  from {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(1, 0, 0, 90deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in;
    opacity: 0; }
  40% {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(1, 0, 0, -20deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in; }
  60% {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(1, 0, 0, 10deg);
    opacity: 1; }
  80% {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(1, 0, 0, -5deg); }
  to {
    transform: perspective(400px); } }

  -webkit-backface-visibility: visible !important;
  backface-visibility: visible !important;
  animation-name: flipInX; }

  from {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, 90deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in;
    opacity: 0; }
  40% {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, -20deg);
    animation-timing-function: ease-in; }
  60% {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, 10deg);
    opacity: 1; }
  80% {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(0, 1, 0, -5deg); }
  to {
    transform: perspective(400px); } }

  backface-visibility: visible !important;

    opacity: 1; }
  to {
    transform: perspective(400px) rotate3d(1, 0, 0, 90deg);

  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale3d(0.1, 0.1, 0.1) translate3d(0, -1000px, 0);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }
  60% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(0.475, 0.475, 0.475) translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1); } }

  to {

  animation-name: zoomOut; }

@keyframes zoomOutDown {
  40% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(0.475, 0.475, 0.475) translate3d(0, -60px, 0);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }
  to {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale3d(0.1, 0.1, 0.1) translate3d(0, 2000px, 0);
    transform-origin: center bottom;
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1); } }

.zoomOutDown {
  animation-name: zoomOutDown; }

@keyframes zoomOutLeft {
  40% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(0.475, 0.475, 0.475) translate3d(42px, 0, 0); }
  to {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.1) translate3d(-2000px, 0, 0);
    transform-origin: left center; } }

.zoomOutLeft {
  animation-name: zoomOutLeft; }

@keyframes zoomOutRight {
  40% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(0.475, 0.475, 0.475) translate3d(-42px, 0, 0); }
  to {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.1) translate3d(2000px, 0, 0);
    transform-origin: right center; } }

.zoomOutRight {
  animation-name: zoomOutRight; }

@keyframes zoomOutUp {
  40% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale3d(0.475, 0.475, 0.475) translate3d(0, 60px, 0);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.55, 0.055, 0.675, 0.19); }
  to {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale3d(0.1, 0.1, 0.1) translate3d(0, -2000px, 0);
    transform-origin: center bottom;
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1); } }

.zoomOutUp {
  animation-name: zoomOutUp; }

@keyframes slideInDown {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);
    visibility: visible; }
  to {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); } }

.slideInDown {
  animation-name: slideInDown; }

@keyframes slideInLeft {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);
    visibility: visible; }
  to {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); } }

.slideInLeft {
  animation-name: slideInLeft; }

@keyframes slideInRight {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);
    visibility: visible; }
  to {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); } }

.slideInRight {
  animation-name: slideInRight; }

@keyframes slideInUp {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);
    visibility: visible; }
  to {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); } }

.slideInUp {
  animation-name: slideInUp; }

@keyframes slideOutDown {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }
  to {
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0); } }

.slideOutDown {
  animation-name: slideOutDown; }

@keyframes slideOutLeft {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }
  to {
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0); } }

.slideOutLeft {
  animation-name: slideOutLeft; }

@keyframes slideOutRight {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }
  to {
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0); } }

.slideOutRight {
  animation-name: slideOutRight; }

@keyframes slideOutUp {
  from {
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0); }
  to {
    visibility: hidden;
    transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0); } }

.slideOutUp {
  animation-name: slideOutUp; }

.directory {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap; }

.directory__menu {
  display: flex;
  flex-basis: 100%;
  margin: 1.375rem 0;
  max-width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1; }

.directory__menu-btn {
  align-content: center;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
  color: #000000;
  display: flex;
  font-weight: 400;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0.75rem 2rem 0.75rem 0.75rem;
  position: relative; }
  .directory__menu-btn::after {
    border-left: 4px solid transparent;
    border-right: 4px solid transparent;
    border-top: 5px solid #E30000;
    content: '';
    height: 0;
    position: absolute;
    right: 12px;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    transition: .3s transform ease-in;
    width: 0; }
  .directory__menu-btn[aria-pressed="true"] {
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-color: transparent; }
    .directory__menu-btn[aria-pressed="true"]::after {
      transform: translateY(-50%) rotate(-180deg); }
  .directory__menu-btn:focus, .directory__menu-btn:hover {
    font-weight: 700; }
    .directory__menu-btn:focus::after, .directory__menu-btn:hover::after {
      border-top: 5px solid #ffffff; }

.directory__menu-letter {
  text-transform: capitalize;
  font-weight: 700; }

  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  width: 100%; }

  display: none; }

.accordion__wrapper {
  margin: 1.25rem 0; }

.accordion__wrapper h2 {
  margin: 0; }

.accordion__wrapper h2 + .accordion {
  margin-top: 1rem; }

.accordion {
  margin: 0 -0.75rem; }

.accordion__trigger {
  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute; }
  .accordion__trigger:checked ~ .accordion__label {
    background: linear-gradient(#ffffff, #F4F4F4);
    border-bottom: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
    color: #000000;
    margin: 0; }
    .accordion__trigger:checked ~ .accordion__label .accordion__label-icon::before {
      background-image: url("files/chevron-down--white.svg");
      transform: translate(50%, -50%) rotate(180deg); }
    .accordion__trigger:checked ~ .accordion__label .accordion__label-icon::after {
      background-color: #E30000;
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px 1px #E30000; }
  .accordion__trigger:checked ~ .accordion__target {
    display: block; }

.accordion__item:last-of-type .accordion__label {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #CFCFCF; }

.accordion__label {
  background-color: #F4F4F4;
  border-top: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1.53;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  padding: 1.375rem 3.75rem 1.375rem 0.75rem;
  position: relative; }

.accordion__label-icon {
  color: #E30000;
  position: absolute;
  right: 2.375rem;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%); }
  .accordion__label-icon::before {
    background-image: url("files/chevron-down--red.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    content: '';
    height: 7px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translate(50%, -50%);
    transition: transform 0.35s ease-in-out;
    width: 12px; }
  .accordion__label-icon::after {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 50%;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px 1px #4a4a4a;
    content: '';
    height: 1.75rem;
    left: 50%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 1.75rem;
    z-index: -1; }

.accordion__target {
  z-index: 2;
  display: none; }

.accordion__target--inner {
  color: #363636;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  line-height: 1.53;
  padding: 1rem 0.75rem; }
  .accordion__target--inner *:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0; }

.accordion__target--inner p {
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  line-height: 1.5; }

.accordion--landing.accordion {
  margin: 1.5625rem 0 1.5625rem 0; }

.accordion--landing .accordion__item {
  margin-bottom: 1rem; }
  .accordion--landing .accordion__item:last-of-type {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
    .accordion--landing .accordion__item:last-of-type .accordion__label {
      border-bottom: none; }

.accordion--landing .accordion__label {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 0;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 11px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700; }

.accordion--landing .accordion__trigger:checked ~ .accordion__label {
  border-bottom: none; }

.accordion--landing .accordion__target--inner {
  padding: 1rem 0 0 0; }

.accordion--landing .article-grid__items {
  margin: 0; }

.article__sub-topic-landing {
  margin: 0 -0.9375rem; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__items {
    margin: 0; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
    padding: 1.25rem 0.75rem; }
    .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item:last-of-type {
      border: 0 none; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item-image-wrapper {
    flex-basis: 5.875rem;
    margin-right: 0.625rem;
    max-width: 5.875rem;
    width: 100%; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item-content {
    flex-basis: calc(100% - 94px);
    max-width: calc(100% - 94px);
    width: 100%; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item-text {
    font-size: 0.875rem; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item-description {
    font-size: 0.8125rem; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__link {
    margin: 0; }
  .article__sub-topic-landing .article-grid__item-description {
    display: block;
    margin: 0; }

/* Used in article-grid and related-movie-reviews */
.global__title {
  border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(207, 207, 207, 0.6);
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-top: 2.375rem;
  padding: 0 0 1rem 0; }

.content-viewport .article-grid .video {
  margin: 0;
  display: block; }

.article-grid--border-top {
  border-top: 3px solid #F09900; }

.article-grid__title {
  border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(207, 207, 207, 0.6);
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-top: 2.375rem;
  padding: 0 0.75rem 1rem 0.75rem; }

.article-grid__items {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  margin-top: 1.125rem; }

.article-grid__items-sidebar .article-grid__link {
  margin: 0 0 1.25rem 0; }

.article-grid__item {
  padding: 0; }

.article-grid__link {
  display: flex;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  text-decoration: none;
  justify-content: space-between; }
  .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-image-container, .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-image-container {
    box-shadow: 0 0 12px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); }
  .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-video-mark--string,
  .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-text, .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-video-mark--string,
  .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-text {
    color: #E30000; }
  .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-video-mark--time, .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-video-mark--time {
    color: #000000; }
  .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-image, .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-image {
    transform: scale(1.1); }
  .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-description, .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-description {
    color: #000000; }
  .article-grid__link,
  .content-viewport .article-grid__link:visited {
    color: black; }

.article-grid__item-video-mark--string {
  display: inline-block;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-right: 5px; }

.article-grid__item-video-mark--time {
  color: #E30000;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin: 5px 0; }

.article-grid__item-image-wrapper {
  width: 48%; }

.article-grid__item-image-container {
  border-radius: 2px;
  border: 3px solid #ffffff;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  transition: box-shadow .2s; }
  .article-grid__item-image-container.video:before {
    content: '';
    width: 37px;
    height: 28px;
    background-image: url("files/img-video-arrow-wht.svg");
    background-size: cover;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    right: 10px;
    z-index: 1; }

.article-grid__item-image {
  border-radius: 2px;
  transition: transform .2s;
  width: 100%; }
  .article-grid__item-image.aspect-16-9 {
    height: 0;
    padding-top: 56.25%; }
  .article-grid__item--4-3 .video .article-grid__item-image {
    max-width: initial;
    width: 142.86%;
    position: relative;
    left: -25%; }

.article-grid__item-content {
  width: 48%; }
  .article-grid__item-content--arabic {
    text-align: right; }

.article-grid__item-text {
  display: block;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.4;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  margin-top: 0; }

.article-grid__items-item-vertically-content .article-grid__link {
  flex-wrap: wrap; }

.article-grid__items-item-vertically-content .article-grid__item-content,
.article-grid__items-item-vertically-content .article-grid__item-image-container,
.article-grid__items-item-vertically-content .article-grid__item-image-wrapper {
  width: 100%; }

.article-grid__item-description {
  display: none; }

.article-grid-4 .article-grid__item-image {
  object-fit: cover; }
  .article-grid-4 .article-grid__item-image.object-fit {
    height: calc(100vw /16*9); }

.article-grid-4 .article-grid__item-content {
  padding: 0 0.1875rem; }

.article-grid-4 .article-grid__item-video-mark--time + .article-grid__item-text {
  margin-top: 0; }

.article-grid-4 .article-grid__item-text {
  line-height: 1.3; }

.article-grid-4 .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-video-mark--string,
.article-grid-4 .article-grid__link:hover .article-grid__item-text, .article-grid-4 .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-video-mark--string,
.article-grid-4 .article-grid__link:focus .article-grid__item-text {
  color: #E30000; }

  margin: 0; }

.banner {
  background-color: #000000;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center center;
  color: #ffffff;
  display: flex;
  height: 14.5rem;
  margin: 0 0 2.5rem;
  padding: 2.5rem 0; }
  .banner--tabbed {
    padding-top: 3.625rem; }
    .banner--tabbed .banner__heading {
      align-self: flex-start; }
  .banner .container {
    display: flex; }
  .banner__heading {
    align-self: flex-end;
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    line-height: 2.25rem;
    margin: 0;
    position: relative; }

.banner-tabs {
  margin: -8rem 0 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1; }
  .banner-tabs__trigger {
    cursor: default;
    opacity: 0;
    position: absolute; }
    .banner-tabs__trigger:checked ~ .banner-tabs__label::after {
      transform: rotate(-180deg); }
    .banner-tabs__trigger:checked ~ .banner-tabs__list {
      display: flex; }
  .banner-tabs__label {
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #efefef;
    color: #363636;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding: 1.25rem 1.875rem;
    position: relative; }
    .banner-tabs__label::after {
      color: #4f75ae;
      content: "\E900";
      flex-shrink: 0;
      font-family: 'icomoon';
      font-size: 0.5rem;
      transition: transform 150ms ease-in-out; }
  .banner-tabs__label, .banner-tabs__link {
    transition: background-color 300ms ease-in-out; }
    .banner-tabs__label:hover, .banner-tabs__label:focus, .banner-tabs__link:hover, .banner-tabs__link:focus {
      background-color: #ffffff; }
  .banner-tabs__label-text {
    flex-grow: 1;
    flex-shrink: 0; }
  .banner-tabs__list {
    box-shadow: 0 0.25rem 0.5rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    display: none;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; }
  .banner-tabs__item {
    border-top: 1px solid #a1a1a1;
    display: block;
    flex-basis: 100%; }
  .banner-tabs__item--active {
    display: none; }
  .banner-tabs__link {
    background-color: #CFCFCF;
    color: #363636;
    display: block;
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 1.3125rem 2.625rem 1.25rem 1.875rem;
    text-decoration: none; }
    .banner-tabs__link:hover, .banner-tabs__link:focus {
      color: #363636;
      text-decoration: none; }

    MEDIUM

  .banner-tabs {

    margin-right: auto;

    .banner-tabs .container {
      width: 41.875rem; } }

/*
--------------------
    LARGE
--------------------
*/
@media screen and (min-width: 75rem) {
  .banner {
    height: 18.438rem;
    margin: 0; }
    .banner__heading {
      align-self: center;
      font-size: 2.625rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 2.625rem; }
      .banner__heading::before {
        font-size: .875rem;
        transform: translateY(-1.625rem); }
  .banner-tabs {
    margin: -4.375rem 0 0;
    position: static;
    transform: none; }
    .banner-tabs .container {
      width: auto; }
    .banner-tabs__label {
      display: none; }
    .banner-tabs__list {
      box-shadow: none;
      display: flex;
      max-height: none;
      width: auto; }
      .banner-tabs__list::before {
        display: none; }
    .banner-tabs__item {
      border: 0;
      flex: 1;
      margin: 0 6px;
      padding: 0; }
    .banner-tabs__item--active {
      display: block; }
      .banner-tabs__item--active .banner-tabs__link {
        cursor: default; }
        .banner-tabs__item--active .banner-tabs__link, .banner-tabs__item--active .banner-tabs__link:hover, .banner-tabs__item--active .banner-tabs__link:focus {
          background-color: #efefef; }
    .banner-tabs__link {
      background-color: rgba(207, 207, 207, 0.8);
      padding: 1.625rem 0;
      text-align: center;
      transition: background-color .15s ease-in-out; }
      .banner-tabs__link:hover, .banner-tabs__link:focus {
        background-color: #CFCFCF; } }

.breadcrumbs {
  display: block;
  margin: 1.5rem 0 1.75rem; }
  .breadcrumbs__list {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; }
  .breadcrumbs__item {
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0;
    position: relative; }
    .breadcrumbs__item::before {
      content: none; }
    .breadcrumbs__item::after {
      content: '/';
      position: relative;
      margin: 0 0.9375rem;
      font-size: 0.8125rem;
      color: #363636; }
    .breadcrumbs__item:last-child::after {
      content: none; }
  .breadcrumbs__link {
    color: #363636;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 2.14;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all .15s ease-in-out; }
    .breadcrumbs__link:focus, .breadcrumbs__link:hover {
      box-shadow: inset 0 -1px 0 #363636;
      color: #363636;
      text-decoration: none; }
    .breadcrumbs__link[href=""]:hover, .breadcrumbs__link[href=""]:focus {
      box-shadow: none;
      cursor: default;
      text-decoration: none; }

/*
--------------------
    BASE/MOBILE
    VARIABLES
    ADDITIONAL COLOURS
--------------------
*/
button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="reset"],
input[type="submit"],
.content-viewport .button {
  background-color: #E85000;
  border: 1px solid #E85000;
  border-radius: 4px;
  color: #ffffff;
  display: block;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: .938rem;
  padding: 0.875rem 1.75rem;
  width: 100%; }
  button:hover, button:focus,
  input[type="button"]:hover,
  input[type="button"]:focus,
  input[type="reset"]:hover,
  input[type="reset"]:focus,
  input[type="submit"]:hover,
  input[type="submit"]:focus,
  .content-viewport .button:hover,
  .content-viewport .button:focus {
    background-color: #E30000;
    border-color: #E30000;
    box-shadow: none;
    color: #ffffff;
    cursor: pointer;
    outline: 0; }
  button.button--reverse, button.button--reverse:hover, button.button--reverse:focus,
  input[type="button"].button--reverse,
  input[type="button"].button--reverse:hover,
  input[type="button"].button--reverse:focus,
  input[type="reset"].button--reverse,
  input[type="reset"].button--reverse:hover,
  input[type="reset"].button--reverse:focus,
  input[type="submit"].button--reverse,
  input[type="submit"].button--reverse:hover,
  input[type="submit"].button--reverse:focus,
  .content-viewport .button.button--reverse,
  .content-viewport .button.button--reverse:hover,
  .content-viewport .button.button--reverse:focus {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    color: #E30000; }
  button.button--reverse:hover, button.button--reverse:focus,
  input[type="button"].button--reverse:hover,
  input[type="button"].button--reverse:focus,
  input[type="reset"].button--reverse:hover,
  input[type="reset"].button--reverse:focus,
  input[type="submit"].button--reverse:hover,
  input[type="submit"].button--reverse:focus,
  .content-viewport .button.button--reverse:hover,
  .content-viewport .button.button--reverse:focus {
    border-color: #E85000;
    text-decoration: underline; }
  button:disabled,
  input[type="button"]:disabled,
  input[type="reset"]:disabled,
  input[type="submit"]:disabled,
  .content-viewport .button:disabled {
    background: #7d7d7d;
    border: 1px solid #7d7d7d; }
    button:disabled:hover, button:disabled:focus,
    input[type="button"]:disabled:hover,
    input[type="button"]:disabled:focus,
    input[type="reset"]:disabled:hover,
    input[type="reset"]:disabled:focus,
    input[type="submit"]:disabled:hover,
    input[type="submit"]:disabled:focus,
    .content-viewport .button:disabled:hover,
    .content-viewport .button:disabled:focus {
      background-color: #7d7d7d;
      border-color: #7d7d7d;
      cursor: default; }
  button + button,
  button + input[type="button"],
  button + input[type="reset"],
  button + input[type="submit"],
  button + .button,
  input[type="button"] + button,
  input[type="button"] + input[type="button"],
  input[type="button"] + input[type="reset"],
  input[type="button"] + input[type="submit"],
  input[type="button"] + .button,
  input[type="reset"] + button,
  input[type="reset"] + input[type="button"],
  input[type="reset"] + input[type="reset"],
  input[type="reset"] + input[type="submit"],
  input[type="reset"] + .button,
  input[type="submit"] + button,
  input[type="submit"] + input[type="button"],
  input[type="submit"] + input[type="reset"],
  input[type="submit"] + input[type="submit"],
  input[type="submit"] + .button,
  .content-viewport .button + button,
  .content-viewport .button + input[type="button"],
  .content-viewport .button + input[type="reset"],
  .content-viewport .button + input[type="submit"],
  .content-viewport .button + .button {
    margin-top: .5rem; }

.button {
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none; }
  .button:hover, .button:focus {
    box-shadow: none;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: none; }
  .button.link--external::after {
    content: '';
    font-family: inherit;
    margin-left: 0; }

    top: 0; }

.main--raw .carousel__component {
  margin-top: -2rem; }

.carousel__component {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  padding-bottom: 2rem; }

.carousel__header {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  order: 3; }

.carousel__header-title {
  display: none; }

.carousel__header-logo {
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center; }

.carousel__header-by {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  font-size: 0.5625rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  max-width: 100%;
  text-align: center; }

.carousel__header-img {
  width: 12.5625rem; }

.carousel__wrapper {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  order: 1;
  position: relative; }

.carousel__viewport {
  height: 22.5rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%; }

.carousel__item {
  display: flex;
  height: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%; }
  .carousel__item::before {
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, #000000 100%);
    bottom: 0;
    content: '';
    height: 70%;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    width: 100%; }
  .carousel__item:focus .carousel__meta::after, .carousel__item:hover .carousel__meta::after {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    color: #000000; }

.carousel__image {
  pointer-events: none;
  width: 100%; }

.carousel__img {
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  width: 100%; }

.carousel__meta {
  bottom: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-bottom: 2.9375rem;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  pointer-events: all;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1; }

.carousel__meta-title,
.carousel__meta-description {
  color: #ffffff;
  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

.carousel__meta-description p {
  margin-bottom: 0; }

.carousel__meta-title {
  font-size: 2.375rem;
  line-height: 2.5rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  margin: 0; }

.carousel__meta-description {
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.3125rem;
  font-weight: 400; }

.carousel__button-meta,
.carousel__button-image {
  display: none; }

.carousel__controls {
  align-items: center;
  bottom: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 1.625rem 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1; }

.carousel__container {
  height: 100%; }

.carousel__button {
  background-color: #DEDEDE;
  border-radius: 100%;
  display: inline-block;
  height: 0.4375rem;
  margin: 0 0.625rem;
  width: 0.4375rem; }

.current__button {
  background-color: #E30000; }

@keyframes fadeInOpacity {
  0% {
    opacity: 0; }
  100% {
    opacity: 1; } }

@keyframes fadeOutOpacity {
  0% {
    opacity: 1; }
  100% {
    opacity: 0; } }

.fade-in {
  animation-duration: 2s;
  animation-iteration-count: 1;
  animation-name: fadeInOpacity;
  animation-timing-function: ease-in;
  z-index: 1; }

.fade-out {
  animation-duration: 2s;
  animation-iteration-count: 1;
  animation-name: fadeOutOpacity;
  animation-timing-function: ease-out; }

.carousel__intro {
  display: flex;
  flex-basis: 100%;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 1.5rem 0;
  max-width: 100%;
  order: 2;
  padding: 0 2.1875rem;
  text-align: center; }

.carousel__intro-text,
.carousel__intro-more {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

.carousel__intro-heading {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  line-height: 28px;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  margin-top: 0; }

.carousel__intro-text {
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  font-weight: 200;
  margin-bottom: 0.375rem; }

.carousel__intro-more {
  color: #007AE8;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 300;
  text-decoration: none;
  position: relative; }
  .carousel__intro-more::after {
    background-image: url("files/nav-arrow--blue.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: contain;
    content: '';
    height: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    margin-left: 0.375rem;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;

    width: 10px; }

    margin-right: 0; }

      text-decoration: none; }

.main--raw .feature-tiles {
  margin: 2rem 0 0 0; }

.main--raw .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__wrapper {
  margin: 0; }

.feature-tiles {
  margin: 1.25rem 0 1.25rem 0; }
  .feature-tiles .empty-tile {
    display: none; }
  .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__section-title {
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 2rem;
    letter-spacing: 0.0625rem;
    line-height: 2.5rem;
    margin: 1.625rem 0 1.25rem;
    font-weight: 300; }
  .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__wrapper {
    display: flex; }
  .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item {
    flex: 1 1 100%;
    display: flex;
    margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
    flex-direction: column;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: none; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item:last-of-type {
      margin-bottom: 0; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item:focus .feature-tiles__details-btn span, .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item:active .feature-tiles__details-btn span {
      background: #ffffff;
      color: inherit; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item .feature-tiles__background-image {
      width: 100%;
      min-height: 218px;
      background-size: cover;
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: center; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item .feature-tiles__details {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      padding: 1.875rem 0 2.6875rem;
      text-align: center;
      height: 100%; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item .feature-tiles__details-title {
      font-size: 1.875rem;
      line-height: 2.5rem;
      font-weight: 200;
      margin-bottom: 0.9375rem;
      padding: 0 0.9375rem; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item .feature-tiles__details-desc {
      font-size: 0.9375rem;
      font-weight: 600;
      line-height: 1.375rem;
      margin-bottom: 1.5625rem;
      padding: 0 0.9375rem; }
    .feature-tiles .feature-tiles__item .feature-tiles__details-btn span {
      padding: 1.0625rem 2rem 1.125rem;
      border: 2px solid #ffffff;
      display: inline-block;
      border-radius: 4px;
      transition: all 0.3s;
      color: #ffffff;
      font-size: 1.125rem;
      line-height: 0.9375rem;
      font-weight: 600; }

  border: none; }
  .content-viewport .sq-form-question-note-control:hover, .content-viewport .sq-form-question-note-control:focus {
    background-color: #CFCFCF;
    color: #ffffff; }
    .content-viewport .sq-form-question-note-control:hover + span, .content-viewport .sq-form-question-note-control:focus + span {
      opacity: 1;
      visibility: visible; }

.content-viewport .sq-form-question-note--popover span {
  color: #000000;
  display: inline-block;
  left: 50%;
  opacity: 0;
  padding: 1rem;
  pointer-events: none;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  visibility: hidden;
  width: 100%; }

.content-viewport .sq-form-question-note {
  color: #555555;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  margin-bottom: .5rem; }

  border-color: #E30000; }

  color: #E30000; }

  margin: 0.625rem 0; }

  padding: 0 0.75rem; }

.content-viewport .select-wrapper {
  position: relative; }

  border-left: 4px solid transparent;
  border-right: 4px solid transparent;

  content: '';

  top: 50%;

  width: 0; }

  border-bottom-right-radius: 0;

    margin-bottom: 1.125rem; }

    text-align: left; }
  .footer-lhs__logo {
    margin: 0;
    width: auto; }
  .footer-lhs__label {
    margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
    font-size: 0.875rem; }

    border-bottom: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
    display: flex;
    flex-basis: 100%;
    padding-bottom: 1.5625rem; }
  .footer-group {
    flex-basis: 33%;
    flex-grow: 1; }

    border: 0; }

    display: none; }

      background: transparent; }

    background-color: transparent;

      content: none; }

    width: auto; }

    display: block; }

    border: 0; }

/*
--------------------
    MODAL ANIMATION
--------------------
*/
@-webkit-keyframes modal-open {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1); }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); } }

@keyframes modal-open {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1.1, 1.1, 1); }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); } }

@-webkit-keyframes modal-close {
  0% {
    opacity: 1; }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1); } }

@keyframes modal-close {
  0% {
    opacity: 1; }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1);
    transform: scale3d(0.9, 0.9, 1); } }

/*
--------------------
    SVG ICONS
--------------------
*/
.svg-box {
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  width: 100px; }

.green-stroke {
  stroke: #7cb342; }

.red-stroke {
  stroke: #ff6245; }

.yellow-stroke {
  stroke: #ffc107; }

.circular circle.path {
  stroke-dasharray: 330;
  stroke-dashoffset: 0;
  stroke-linecap: round;
  opacity: 0.4;
  animation: 0.7s draw-circle ease-out; }

/*------- Checkmark ---------*/
.checkmark {
  stroke-width: 6.25;
  stroke-linecap: round;
  position: absolute;
  top: 56px;
  left: 49px;
  width: 52px;
  height: 40px; }

.checkmark path {
  animation: 1s draw-check ease-out; }

@keyframes draw-circle {
  0% {
    stroke-dasharray: 0, 330;
    stroke-dashoffset: 0;
    opacity: 1; }
  80% {
    stroke-dasharray: 330, 330;
    stroke-dashoffset: 0;
    opacity: 1; }
  100% {
    opacity: 0.4; } }

@keyframes draw-check {
  0% {
    stroke-dasharray: 49, 80;
    stroke-dashoffset: 48;
    opacity: 0; }
  50% {
    stroke-dasharray: 49, 80;
    stroke-dashoffset: 48;
    opacity: 1; }
  100% {
    stroke-dasharray: 130, 80;
    stroke-dashoffset: 48; } }

/*---------- Cross ----------*/
.cross {
  stroke-width: 6.25;
  stroke-linecap: round;
  position: absolute;
  top: 54px;
  left: 54px;
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px; }

.cross .first-line {
  animation: 0.7s draw-first-line ease-out; }

.cross .second-line {
  animation: 0.7s draw-second-line ease-out; }

@keyframes draw-first-line {
  0% {
    stroke-dasharray: 0, 56;
    stroke-dashoffset: 0; }
  50% {
    stroke-dasharray: 0, 56;
    stroke-dashoffset: 0; }
  100% {
    stroke-dasharray: 56, 330;
    stroke-dashoffset: 0; } }

@keyframes draw-second-line {
  0% {
    stroke-dasharray: 0, 55;
    stroke-dashoffset: 1; }
  50% {
    stroke-dasharray: 0, 55;
    stroke-dashoffset: 1; }
  100% {
    stroke-dasharray: 55, 0;
    stroke-dashoffset: 70; } }

.alert-sign {
  stroke-width: 6.25;
  stroke-linecap: round;
  position: absolute;
  top: 40px;
  left: 68px;
  width: 15px;
  height: 70px;
  animation: 0.5s alert-sign-bounce cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275); }

.alert-sign .dot {
  stroke: none;
  fill: #ffc107; }

@keyframes alert-sign-bounce {
  0% {
    transform: scale(0);
    opacity: 0; }
  50% {
    transform: scale(0);
    opacity: 1; }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1); } }

/*
--------------------
    BASE/MOBILE
    VARIABLES
    ADDITIONAL COLOURS
--------------------
*/
.glossary-container {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #ffffff 0%, #EEEEEE 100%);
  border-radius: 2px;
  border: 0.625rem solid #ffffff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0.625rem 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  padding: 1rem 0.625rem;
  transform: translateY(-100%);
  width: 17.5rem;
  z-index: 1; }
  .glossary-container::after {
    border: 0.5px solid #10B700;
    content: '';
    height: calc(100% - 32px);
    left: 15px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%); }
  .glossary-container &gt; * {
    pointer-events: none; }

.glossary-header {
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem 1.875rem; }

.glossary-content {
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  margin-left: 1.875rem; }

  margin: 1rem 0 1rem 1rem;
  padding: 0; }

  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  margin: 0; }

  margin: 0; }

  position: relative; }

  color: #E30000;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1;
  margin: 1.25rem 0 0.5rem; }

  background-image: url("files/heading-glossary.svg");
  background-position: center center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  content: '';
  cursor: pointer;
  height: 22px;

  top: 50%;

.health-tiles {
  position: relative; }
  .health-tiles .health-tile-intro__heading {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    margin-top: 2rem; }
  .health-tiles .health-tile__wrapper {
    margin: 0 -0.75rem;
    position: relative; }
    .health-tiles .health-tile__wrapper::before, .health-tiles .health-tile__wrapper::after {
      content: '';
      height: 100%;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      width: 15px;
      z-index: 1; }
    .health-tiles .health-tile__wrapper::before {
      left: 0;
      background: linear-gradient(90deg, white 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%); }
    .health-tiles .health-tile__wrapper::after {
      right: 0;
      background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 0%, white 100%); }
  .health-tiles .scrollbox {
    white-space: nowrap;
    margin-top: 0.8125rem;
    overflow-x: scroll;
    scrollbar-width: none;
    -ms-overflow-style: none;
    position: relative; }
    .health-tiles .scrollbox::-webkit-scrollbar {
      width: 0;
      height: 0; }
    .health-tiles .scrollbox.scrollbox--start {
      padding-right: 3.5rem; }
    .health-tiles .scrollbox.scrollbox--end {
      padding-left: 3.5rem; }
    .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tiles__wrapper {
      transition: .3s transform ease-out; }
    .health-tiles .scrollbox a.health-tile {
      text-decoration: none; }
    .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile {
      display: inline-block;
      margin-right: 0.8125rem;
      vertical-align: top;
      max-width: 9.4375rem; }
      .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile:first-child {
        margin-left: 0.75rem; }
      .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile:active {
        outline: none; }
        .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile:active img {
          box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
          border: 3px solid #FFFFFF; }
        .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile:active .health-tile__heading {
          color: red; }
      .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile__image-wrapper img {
        width: 9.4375rem;
        height: 5.0625rem; }
      .health-tiles .scrollbox .health-tile__heading {
        color: #000000;
        font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
        margin-top: 0.6875rem;
        white-space: pre-wrap;
        min-height: 3rem; }
  .health-tiles .directory__menu-control {
    background-color: transparent;
    top: 0; }
    .health-tiles .directory__menu-control::after {
      top: 52px;
      width: 15px;
      height: 10px; }
    .health-tiles .directory__menu-control.directory__menu-next::after {
      right: 0;
      left: auto; }
    .health-tiles .directory__menu-control.directory__menu-prev::after {
      left: 12px; }

  overflow: hidden; }

  height: 21.875rem;
  position: relative; }

  height: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%; }

  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  width: 100%; }

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 1.3125rem 0.75rem 1.625rem 0.75rem;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%; }

  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 66px;
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 0.5625rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  padding: 0.25rem 0.625rem 0.25rem 0.625rem;
  position: relative;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
  .hero__home-button::before {
    background-image: url("files/chevron-down--red.svg");
    background-size: cover;
    content: '';
    display: inline-block;
    height: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 1px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    width: 9px; }

    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px #CFCFCF;
    color: #000000; }

  align-items: flex-end;
  display: flex;
  flex-basis: 100%;
  justify-content: space-between;
  max-width: 100%;
  position: relative; }

    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, #000000 90%);

    transform: translateX(-50%);

.main--raw .image_tiles__wrapper {
  margin: -0.375rem 0 0 0;
  padding: 0 0.375rem; }

.image_tiles__wrapper {
  margin: 0.5rem -0.375rem; }

.image-tiles__item {
  flex-basis: calc(50% - 12px);
  max-width: calc(50% - 12px);
  min-height: 6.625rem;
  margin: 0.375rem;
  border-radius: 1.9px;
  text-decoration: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative; }
  .image-tiles__item:hover, .image-tiles__item:focus {
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    outline: 3px solid #ffffff; }
    .image-tiles__item:hover .image-tiles__background, .image-tiles__item:focus .image-tiles__background {
      transform: scale(1.1); }
  .image-tiles__item .image-tiles__background {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: -1;
    transition: all .3s;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat; }
  .image-tiles__item .image-tiles__text-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0; }
  .image-tiles__item .image-tiles__text-backgroud {
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    align-self: flex-end;
    padding: 0.25rem 0.5625rem;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65) 70%); }
    .image-tiles__item .image-tiles__text-backgroud span {
      display: block;
      font-size: 0.625rem;
      line-height: 1.125rem;
      font-weight: 600; }
      .image-tiles__item .image-tiles__text-backgroud span.image-tiles__stage-name {
        color: #ffffff;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
        letter-spacing: -0.61px; }
      .image-tiles__item .image-tiles__text-backgroud span.image-tiles__range {
        color: #F7b800; }

      MEDIUM

  display: flex;

  text-align: center; }

  margin-left: -0.375rem;
  margin-right: -0.375rem; }

  height: 5.75rem;
  padding: 0.375rem; }

  border-radius: 1px;
  border: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem 0.75rem 0.75rem;
  position: relative;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: .3s all ease-out; }
  .language-tile__link:hover, .language-tile__link:focus {

    box-shadow: 0 0 6px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); }

    background-size: contain;

    position: absolute;
    right: 12px;
    top: 50%;

      border-bottom: 0 none; }

      background-color: transparent;

      color: #112745;
      display: flex;
      padding-right: 0.5rem;
      text-decoration: none;

      .lhs-nav__link:hover, .lhs-nav__link:focus, .lhs-nav__sublink:hover, .lhs-nav__sublink:focus, .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep:hover, .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep:focus {
        background-color: #e1e1e1;
        color: #363636;
        text-decoration: none; }
      .lhs-nav__link:focus, .lhs-nav__sublink:focus, .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep:focus {
        outline: none; }
    .lhs-nav__sublink, .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep {
      font-weight: 600;
      margin-left: 1.375rem;
      padding-bottom: 0.9375rem;
      padding-top: 0.9375rem; }
    .lhs-nav__link {
      font-weight: 700;
      padding-left: 0.875rem;
      padding-bottom: 1rem;
      padding-top: 1rem; }
    .lhs-nav__sublink {
      padding-left: 0.375rem; }
    .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep {
      font-size: 0.9375rem;
      padding-left: 1.375rem; }
    .lhs-nav__link--has-children::after, .lhs-nav__sublink--has-children::after {
      align-self: center;
      content: "\E900";
      display: block;
      flex-shrink: 0;
      font-family: 'icomoon';
      font-size: 0.5rem;
      font-weight: 400;
      width: 0.875rem; }
    .lhs-nav__link-text {
      display: block;
      flex-grow: 1;
      flex-shrink: 0;
      margin-right: 0.5rem;
      max-width: calc(100% - 1.375rem); }
    .lhs-nav__item--parent .lhs-nav__link,
    .lhs-nav__subitem--parent .lhs-nav__sublink {
      border-bottom-color: #4f75ae;
      border-bottom-width: 2px; }
    .lhs-nav__subitem--parent .lhs-nav__sublink {
      font-weight: 700; }
    .lhs-nav__item--parent .lhs-nav__link--has-children::after,
    .lhs-nav__item--current .lhs-nav__link--has-children::after,
    .lhs-nav__subitem--parent .lhs-nav__sublink--has-children::after,
    .lhs-nav__subitem--current .lhs-nav__sublink--has-children::after {
      content: "\E901"; }
    .lhs-nav__item--parent &gt; .lhs-nav__sublist,
    .lhs-nav__subitem--parent &gt; .lhs-nav__sublistdeep,
    .lhs-nav__item--current &gt; .lhs-nav__sublist,
    .lhs-nav__subitem--current &gt; .lhs-nav__sublistdeep {
      display: block; }
    .lhs-nav__item--parent, .lhs-nav__item--current {
      border-color: #4f75ae;
      border-style: none none solid none;
      border-width: 0 0 2px 0; }
    .lhs-nav__item--current .lhs-nav__link,
    .lhs-nav__subitem--current .lhs-nav__sublink,
    .lhs-nav__subitemdeep--current .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep {
      border-bottom-color: #233857;
      font-weight: 700;
      padding-bottom: 17px;
      padding-top: 17px; }
      .lhs-nav__item--current .lhs-nav__link, .lhs-nav__item--current .lhs-nav__link:hover, .lhs-nav__item--current .lhs-nav__link:focus,
      .lhs-nav__subitem--current .lhs-nav__sublink,
      .lhs-nav__subitem--current .lhs-nav__sublink:hover,
      .lhs-nav__subitem--current .lhs-nav__sublink:focus,
      .lhs-nav__subitemdeep--current .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep,
      .lhs-nav__subitemdeep--current .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep:hover,
      .lhs-nav__subitemdeep--current .lhs-nav__sublinkdeep:focus {
        background-color: #233857;
        color: #ffffff;
        cursor: default; } }

@font-face {
  font-family: 'icomoon';
  src: url("https://s3.amazonaws.com/icomoon.io/4/Loading/icomoon.eot?-9haulc");
  src: url("https://s3.amazonaws.com/icomoon.io/4/Loading/icomoon.eot?#iefix-9haulc") format("embedded-opentype"), url("https://s3.amazonaws.com/icomoon.io/4/Loading/icomoon.woff?-9haulc") format("woff"), url("https://s3.amazonaws.com/icomoon.io/4/Loading/icomoon.ttf?-9haulc") format("truetype"), url("https://s3.amazonaws.com/icomoon.io/4/Loading/icomoon.svg?-9haulc#icomoon") format("svg");
  font-weight: normal;
  font-style: normal; }

input[type='checkbox'],
input[type='radio'] {
  cursor: pointer; }

.icon-spinner:before {
  content: "\E000"; }

.icon-spinner-2:before {
  content: "\E001"; }

.icon-spinner-3:before {
  content: "\E002"; }

.icon-spinner-4:before {
  content: "\E003"; }

.icon-spinner-5:before {
  content: "\E004"; }

.icon-spinner-6:before {
  content: "\E005"; }

.icon-spinner-7:before {
  content: "\E006"; }

  0% {
    transform: rotate(0); }
  100% {
    transform: rotate(360deg); } }

.spinner {
  font-family: 'icomoon' !important;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 4em;
  height: 1em;
  line-height: 1;
  margin: 0.5em;
  animation: anim-rotate 2s infinite linear;
  color: #E30000;
  text-shadow: 0 0 0.25em rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); }

  animation: anim-rotate 1s infinite steps(8); }

  animation: anim-rotate 1s infinite steps(12); }

  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  text-align: center; }

  font-size: 2rem; }

.dashboard__modal-contents.with-spinner {
  text-align: center; }

    align-self: flex-start;
    margin: 0; }

  border-bottom: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
  display: flex;
  padding: 1.625rem 0.75rem 1.125rem 0.75rem; }

  flex-basis: 5.6875rem;
  margin-right: 0.625rem;
  max-height: 8rem;
  max-width: 5.6875rem; }

  height: 100%;
  width: 100%; }

  border-bottom: 0;
  flex-basis: 100%;

  display: flex;

    outline: 0 none; }

  padding-left: 1.75rem;

    width: 20px;
    left: 0; }

/*

    display: none; } }

.news-search {
  margin-top: 2.1875rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.875rem; }
  .news-search-form {
    max-width: 36.5625rem;
    margin: 0 auto; }
    .news-search-form__wrapper {
      border-bottom: 2px solid #4a4a4a; }
    .news-search-form__input {
      background: none;
      border: none;
      color: #4a4a4a;
      font-size: 0.8125rem;
      padding: 1.125rem 0;
      width: 90%; }
    .news-search-form__search-icon {
      color: #4f75ae;
      font-size: 1.25rem; }
    .news-search-form__submit {
      background: none;
      border: none;
      float: right;
      height: 1.25rem;
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      padding-top: 0.75rem;
      width: 10%; }
      .news-search-form__submit:hover, .news-search-form__submit:focus {
        background-color: transparent; }

.news-filter {
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(74, 74, 74, 0.2);
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(74, 74, 74, 0.2);
  padding: 0.3125rem 0 1.125rem; }
  .news-filter-form {
    display: flex;
    flex-flow: row wrap;
    margin-top: 0.5rem;
    width: 100%; }
    .news-filter-form__title {
      flex: 1 100%;
      font-size: 1rem;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin-bottom: 0.1875rem; }
    .news-filter-form__questions {
      width: 100%;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: flex-end; }
    .news-filter-form .sq-form-question {
      flex: 1 auto;
      margin: 0;
      margin-left: 1.375rem;
      max-width: 7.875rem;
      width: 40%; }
      .news-filter-form .sq-form-question select {
        width: 100%; }

  display: flex;
  margin: 0 auto;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;

  text-align: center; }

      margin-left: auto; }

  margin: 1.5rem 0; }

  color: #000000;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin: 0.625rem 0;
  text-align: center; }

.page-rating__buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  position: relative; }

.page-rating__btn {
  align-self: center;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-color: #E3E3E3;
  color: #4F4F4F;
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.875rem;
  text-transform: capitalize;
  width: initial;
  border-width: 2px; }
  .page-rating__btn:first-of-type {
    border-top-left-radius: 6px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 6px;
    border-top-right-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
    border-right: none;
    border-right: 0.5px solid #E3E3E3; }
  .page-rating__btn:last-of-type {
    border-top-left-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
    border-top-right-radius: 6px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 6px;
    border-left: none;
    border-left: 0.5px solid #E3E3E3; }
  .page-rating__btn:focus, .page-rating__btn:hover {
    background-color: #E7F4FF;
    color: #000000;
    border-color: #E3E3E3;
    box-shadow: inherit; }
  .page-rating__btn:disabled {
    background-color: transparent;
    border-color: #E3E3E3;
    border-width: 2px;
    color: #4F4F4F; }
    .page-rating__btn:disabled:focus, .page-rating__btn:disabled:hover {
      background-color: transparent;
      border-color: #E3E3E3; }

  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 0.5rem 0 0 0; }

  background-color: #E7F4FF;
  cursor: default; }
  .page-rating__btn--active:hover, .page-rating__btn--active:focus {
    color: #4F4F4F;
    cursor: default; }

.pagination {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-align: center; }
  .pagination__list {
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; }
  .pagination__item {
    display: inline-block;
    vertical-align: middle; }
  .pagination__dots {
    position: relative;
    height: 0.25rem;
    width: 0.25rem;
    border-radius: 100%;
    background-color: #808080;
    display: block;
    margin: 0 0.5rem; }
    .pagination__dots::before, .pagination__dots::after {
      content: '';
      display: block;
      height: 4px;
      position: absolute;
      width: 4px;
      border-radius: 100%;
      background-color: #808080; }
    .pagination__dots::before {
      left: 10px; }
    .pagination__dots::after {
      right: 10px; }
  .pagination__item--current .pagination__link {
    color: #ffffff; }
    .pagination__item--current .pagination__link::before {
      background-color: #808080; }
    .pagination__item--current .pagination__link:focus, .pagination__item--current .pagination__link:hover {
      color: #ffffff;
      font-weight: 500; }
  .pagination__prev, .pagination__next, .pagination__link {
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none; }
    .pagination__prev:hover, .pagination__prev:focus, .pagination__next:hover, .pagination__next:focus, .pagination__link:hover, .pagination__link:focus {
      text-decoration: none; }
  .pagination__prev {
    border-right: 1px solid #D8D8D8; }
    .pagination__prev::after {
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(90deg); }
    .pagination__prev:hover::after, .pagination__prev:focus::after {
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(90deg) scale(0.9); }
  .pagination__next {
    border-left: 1px solid #D8D8D8; }
    .pagination__next::after {
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(-90deg); }
    .pagination__next:hover::after, .pagination__next:focus::after {
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(-90deg) scale(0.9); }
  .pagination__prev, .pagination__next {
    height: 2.625rem;
    position: relative;
    width: 2.625rem; }
    .pagination__prev::after, .pagination__next::after {
      background-image: url("files/nav-arrow-red.svg");
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-size: contain;
      content: '';
      height: 10px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      transition: color .15s ease-in-out;
      width: 15px; }
    .pagination__prev.inactive, .pagination__next.inactive {
      cursor: default;
      display: none; }
  .pagination__link {
    color: #808080;
    display: block;
    padding: 0.625rem 0.75rem;
    position: relative; }
    .pagination__link::before {
      border-radius: 100%;
      content: '';
      height: 27px;
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      transition: background-color .15s ease-in-out;
      width: 27px;
      z-index: -1; }
    .pagination__link:hover, .pagination__link:focus {
      color: #808080; }
      .pagination__link:hover::before, .pagination__link:focus::before {
        background-color: #D8D8D8; }

.results-list {
  padding: 1rem 0; }

  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center; }

  position: relative; }

.results-list__wrapper .select-item {
  text-align: center; }

.results-list__wrapper .select-link {
  padding: 0.625rem; }

.results-list__select-wrapper {
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative; }
  .results-list__select-wrapper::after {
    border-left: 4px solid transparent;
    border-right: 4px solid transparent;
    border-top: 5px solid #E30000;
    content: '';
    cursor: pointer;
    height: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    position: absolute;
    right: 12px;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    transition: .3s transform ease-in;
    width: 0; }
  .results-list__select-wrapper.is-active .sq-form-field {
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-color: transparent; }
  .results-list__select-wrapper.is-active::after {
    transform: translateY(-50%) rotate(-180deg); }

  -moz-appearance: none;

    display: none; }

  margin-left: 1rem;
  font-size: 0.9375rem; }

  0% {
    transform: scale(1); }
  80% {
    transform: scale(1.09); }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1.07); } }

.quick-links {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  min-height: 4.375rem;
  padding-bottom: 1.875rem;
  /* Individual icons */ }
  .quick-links__list {
    list-style: none;
    margin-top: -2.875rem;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding-left: 0; }
  .quick-links__link {
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #e4e0da;
    color: #4a4a4a;
    display: flex;
    font-size: 0.8125rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 2px;
    padding: 1.5rem 1.75rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: background-color 500ms ease-in-out;
    width: 100%; }
  .quick-links__item:last-child .quick-links__link {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
  .quick-links__link-icon, .quick-links__link-text {
    display: block;
    flex-shrink: 0; }
  .quick-links__link-icon {
    margin-right: 1.5rem;
    position: relative;
    width: 1.625rem; }
    .quick-links__link-icon * {
      position: absolute;
      left: 0; }
      .quick-links__link-icon *::before {
        margin: 0 !important; }
  .quick-links__link-icon--payment {
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    height: 1.75rem; }
  .quick-links__link-icon--account {
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    height: 1.75rem; }
  .quick-links__link-icon--checklist {
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    height: 1.75rem; }
  .quick-links__link-icon--warning {
    font-size: 1.5625rem;
    height: 1.5625rem; }
  .quick-links__link-icon--home {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    height: 1.25rem; }
  .quick-links__link-text {
    flex-grow: 1; }
  .quick-links ul li::before {
    display: none; }
  .quick-links a:focus, .quick-links a:hover {
    border-bottom: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    color: #4a4a4a; }
  .quick-links a:hover {
    text-decoration: none; }
    .quick-links a:hover .quick-links__link-text {
      text-decoration: underline; }
