.related-movie {
  border-top: 3px solid #F09900;
  margin: 0 -0.75rem; }

/* Used in article-grid and related-movie-reviews */
.related-movie .global__title {
  padding-left: 0.75rem;
  padding-right: 0.75rem; }

.related-movie__items {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap; }

.related-movie__item {
  border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(207, 207, 207, 0.6);
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
  padding: 0.875rem 0.75rem 0.875rem 0.75rem; }
  .related-movie__item:last-child {
    border-bottom: 0 none; }
  .related-movie__item:focus .related-movie__item-title, .related-movie__item:hover .related-movie__item-title {
    color: #EC1D24; }
  .related-movie__item:focus .related-movie__item-thumbnail, .related-movie__item:hover .related-movie__item-thumbnail {
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    outline: 3px solid #ffffff; }

.related-movie__item-thumbnail {
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-basis: 5.6875rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  max-height: 8rem;
  max-width: 5.6875rem;
  position: relative; }

.related-movie__img {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%; }

.related-movie__item-content {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  flex-grow: 1;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-left: 0.75rem; }

.related-movie__item-title {
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  letter-spacing: -0.2px;
  line-height: 1.4;
  margin: 0;
  text-decoration: none; }

.content-viewport .related-movie__item-title a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none; }
  .content-viewport .related-movie__item-title a:focus, .content-viewport .related-movie__item-title a:hover {
    color: #EC1D24; }
  .content-viewport .related-movie__item-title a:visited {
    color: inherit; }

.related-movie__item-accessibility {
  margin: 0.1875rem 0 0.3125rem 0;
  position: relative; }

.related-movie__item-age {
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 0.6875rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  position: relative;
  margin-right: 0.25rem;
  vertical-align: middle; }
  .related-movie__item-age::before {
    background-image: url("files/green-tick.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: contain;
    content: '';
    display: inline-block;
    height: 1rem;
    margin-right: 0.3125rem;
    vertical-align: text-bottom;
    width: 1rem; }

.related-movie__item-classification {
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
  height: 1.1875rem;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  width: 1.1875rem; }

.content-viewport .related-movie__genre {
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  color: #017DE5;
  text-decoration: underline; }
  .content-viewport .related-movie__genre:hover, .content-viewport .related-movie__genre:focus, .content-viewport .related-movie__genre:visited {
    color: #017DE5;
    text-decoration: none; }

  align-items: flex-end;
  color: #000000;
  display: flex;
  flex-grow: 1;
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  letter-spacing: .9px;
  margin: 0; }

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap; }

  flex-basis: 100%;
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
  max-width: 100%; }

  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  flex-basis: 100%;
  flex-grow: 1;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: 0.5rem 0 1.625rem 0;
  max-width: 100%; }

  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

  flex-basis: 33.333333%;
  max-width: 33.333333%;
  padding: 0 0.375rem 0 0; }

  flex-basis: 66.666667%;
  max-width: 66.666667%;
  padding: 0 0 0 0.375rem; }

  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: 1px solid #CFCFCF;
  padding: 0.6875rem 0.75rem;
  text-align: center; }

    background-color: #E30000;
    border-color: #E30000; }

      color: #ffffff;
      font-weight: 600; }
  .toggle-filter-search.toggle-filter-search-inactive {
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 1px solid #CFCFCF; }
    .toggle-filter-search.toggle-filter-search-inactive .search__filter-btn-text {
      color: #E30000; }

  color: #E30000;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 600; }

  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%; }

  border: 0 none;
  display: inline-block;
  display: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0; }

    height: 0;

    right: 10px;
    top: 50%;

    width: 0; }

    columns: 1;
    padding: 0; }
  .search__filter-category-item {
    line-height: 1.31;
    margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0; }
  .search__filter-category-input:checked + .search__filter-category-label::after {
    background-image: url("files/tick.svg");
    transform: scale(1); }
  .search__filter-category-label {
    color: #3D3D3D;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    padding-left: 2rem; }
    .search__filter-category-label::before {
      top: 1px; }
    .search__filter-category-label::after {
      top: 4px;
      transform: scale(0); }
  .search__filter-category-show-more {
    color: #3D3D3D;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem; }
    .search__filter-category-show-more:hover, .search__filter-category-show-more:focus {
      color: #E30000; }
    .search__filter-category-show-more::after {
      content: none; }
  .search__filter-buttons {
    display: none; }
  .search__bar {
    margin-bottom: 1.75rem; }
  .search__bar .search {
    margin: 0;
    max-width: 53%;
    flex-basis: 53%; }
  .search__result-bar,
  .search__filters-controler + .search__result-bar {
    flex-basis: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0; }
  .search__result-bar__info {
    margin-right: 1rem; }
  .search__result-bar__sort-select {
    padding: 0.5625rem 1.875rem 0.5625rem 0.9375rem; }
  .search__filters-sidebar {
    flex-basis: 47%;
    margin: 0;
    max-width: 47%; }
  .search__filters-controler {
    display: none; } }

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 2.25rem 0.75rem 3.25rem 0.75rem; }

.subscribe-panel__heading {
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 1.875rem;
  line-height: 30px;
  margin: 0 0 1.25rem 0;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: 300; }

.subscribe-panel__form {
  width: 100%; }

.subscribe-panel__container {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  padding: 0 1rem; }

.subscribe-panel__image {
  width: 100%; }

.subscribe-panel__content {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 0.75rem 0 2rem 0;
  text-align: center;
  width: 100%; }

  margin-top: 0; }

  font-size: 0.875rem;
  line-height: 18px; }
  .subscribe-panel__wysiwyg p:last-of-type {
    margin: 0; }

  font-size: 1.875rem;
  font-weight: 200;
  line-height: 1.75rem;
  margin: 2.3125rem 0 1.25rem; }

.subscribe-panel__more {
  margin-top: 1rem; }

.subscribe-panel__content .rdt {
  width: 100%; }

  text-align: center; }

  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%); }
  .subscribe-panel__content .rdtOpen .rdtPicker::before {
    content: none; }

.subscribe-panel__submitting {
  width: 100%; }

.subscribe-panel__inputs-content {
  width: 100%; }

.subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-question {
  margin: 1rem 0 0 0; }

.subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-question-title,
.subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-question-datetime label.sq-form-question-title {
  color: #E30000;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 30px;
  text-transform: none;
  width: 100%; }

  background-color: #F6F6F6;
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  padding: 0.5625rem 0.75rem; }
  .subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-field::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: #2C3342;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-align: center; }
  .subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-field::-moz-placeholder {
    color: #2C3342;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-align: center; }
  .subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-field:-ms-input-placeholder {
    color: #2C3342;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-align: center; }
  .subscribe-panel__inputs-content .sq-form-field:-moz-placeholder {
    color: #2C3342;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-align: center; }

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-top: 0.9375rem; }

  margin: 0.5rem 0 0 0; }

  position: relative; }
  .subscribe-panel__inputs .sq-form-question-text.sq-form-question-error .sq-form-error,
  .subscribe-panel__inputs .sq-form-question-email-address.sq-form-question-error .sq-form-error {
    position: relative; }

.subscribe-panel__inputs .sq-form-question-title {
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 15px; }

  border: 1px solid #D8D8D8;
  padding: 0.5625rem 0.75rem; }

.subscribe-panel__inputs-control {
  margin-top: 0.9375rem;
  width: 100%; }

.subscribe-panel__terms {
  margin-top: 1rem;
  order: 1; }

.subscribe-panel__terms .sq-form-question-title {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px; }

  display: block;
  margin: 0; }

  padding: 0; }

  cursor: auto;
  margin: 0; }
  .subscribe-panel__terms .sq-form-question-tickbox-list label::after {
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%) scale(0); }

  width: 100%; }

    border-color: #E30000; }

  transform: translateY(-50%) scale(1); }

  transform: translateY(-50%) scale(1); }

.subscribe-panel__terms .sq-form-question-tickbox-list .sq-form-field:hover + label::before {
  background-color: #FAFAFA; }

.subscribe-panel__terms .sq-form-question-tickbox-list .sq-form-field:focus + label::after {
  transform: translateY(-50%) scale(1); }

.subscribe-panel__terms .sq-form-question-tickbox-list .sq-form-field:focus + label::before {
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px  #4D90FE;
  background-color: #FAFAFA;
  border: 1px solid #4D90FE;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px  #4D90FE;
  outline: none; }

  color: #000000;
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  font-weight: 400; }

.subscribe-panel__terms .sq-form-question-tickbox-list span a {
  color: inherit; }

.content-viewport table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  display: block;
  margin: 2.5rem 0;
  overflow-x: auto;
  table-layout: fixed;
  width: 100%; }
  .content-viewport table caption {
    color: #363636;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-style: italic; }
  .content-viewport table tr th {
    background-color: #233857;
    border-right: 0.1875rem solid #CFCFCF;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 2.14;
    padding: 0.625rem 1.5rem;
    text-transform: uppercase; }
    .content-viewport table tr th:last-child {
      border-right: 0 none; }
    .content-viewport table tr th span.lowercase {
      text-transform: lowercase; }
  .content-viewport table tr .table__header--sortable {
    padding: 0;
    position: relative; }
  .content-viewport table tr td {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-right: 0.1875rem solid #CFCFCF;
    border-top: 0.125rem solid #CFCFCF;
    color: #363636;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    line-height: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem;
    vertical-align: top; }
    .content-viewport table tr td:last-child {
      border-right: 0 none; }
    .content-viewport table tr td p {
      font-size: 0.875rem;
      line-height: 1rem; }
    .content-viewport table tr td p:last-child {
      margin-bottom: 0; }
    .content-viewport table tr td input[type="checkbox"],
    .content-viewport table tr td input[type="radio"] {
      cursor: pointer;
      vertical-align: bottom; }
  .content-viewport table tr.highlight td {
    background-color: #e5e5e5; }
  .content-viewport table.alternative tr:nth-child(even) td {
    background-color: #fafafa; }
  .content-viewport table.alternative tr:nth-child(odd) td {
    background-color: #ffffff; }

.content-viewport .table__header-sort-button {
  align-items: center;
  border: 0 none;
  bottom: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  left: 0;
  min-width: 0;
  padding: 0.625rem 1.5rem;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  text-align: left;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%; }
  .content-viewport .table__header-sort-button::after {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    font-family: 'icomoon';
    font-size: 0.375rem; }
  .content-viewport .table__header-sort-button:hover, .content-viewport .table__header-sort-button:focus {
    background-color: #4a4a4a; }
  .content-viewport .table__header-sort-button:focus {
    outline: none; }

.content-viewport .table__header-sort-button--ascending::after {
  content: "\E901"; }

.content-viewport .table__header-sort-button--descending::after {
  content: "\E900"; }

.content-viewport .table__header-text, .content-viewport .table__header-sort-button::after {
  flex-shrink: 0; }

.content-viewport .table__header-text {
  display: block;
  flex-grow: 1;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

  border-top: 0.125rem solid #CFCFCF;
  vertical-align: top; }

  margin: 0;

  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute; }
  .content-viewport .tab__trigger:focus ~ .tab__label,
  .content-viewport .tab__trigger:hover ~ .tab__label {
    background-color: #f7f7f7; }

    background-color: #233857;
    color: #ffffff;
    font-weight: 700; }

      color: #ffffff;
      content: '\E901'; }

    display: block; }

  display: block;

  line-height: 1.5rem;

  position: relative; }

.text-carousel {
  margin: 1.875rem 0; }

.text-carousel__wrapper {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap; }

.text-carousel__text {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  margin-bottom: 1.875rem; }
  .text-carousel__text *:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0; }

.text-carousel__carousel {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  position: relative; }

.text-carousel__carousel-viewport {
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%; }
  .text-carousel__carousel-viewport::before {
    border-left: 2px solid #E30000;
    content: '';
    height: 100%;
    left: 8px;
    position: absolute;
    width: 2px;
    z-index: 2; }

.text-carousel__carousel-item {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  height: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  padding-left: 1.25rem;
  width: 100%; }
  .text-carousel__carousel-item *:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0; }
  .text-carousel__carousel-item .quote {
    border: 0 none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0; }
  .text-carousel__carousel-item blockquote {
    border: 0 none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 0 1rem 0; }
  .text-carousel__carousel-item.fade-out {
    display: none;
    animation-fill-mode: forwards; }

@keyframes fadeInOpacity {
  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    position: relative; }
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
    position: relative; } }
  .text-carousel__carousel-item.fade-in {
    animation-duration: 2s;
    animation-iteration-count: 1;
    animation-name: fadeInOpacity;
    animation-timing-function: ease-in;
    animation-fill-mode: forwards;
    z-index: 1; }

  align-items: center;
  bottom: 0;
  display: flex;
  margin: 1.5rem 0 0 0;
  padding: 0 0.625rem;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1; }

    color: #017DE5;
    text-decoration: none; }

  color: #E30000;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 200;
  line-height: 1.75rem;
  margin: 2.3125rem 0 1.25rem; }

  color: #E30000;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1;
  margin: 1.25rem 0 0.5rem; }

  color: #363636;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 1.58; }

  padding-left: 1.6875rem; }
  ol li {
    counter-increment: list;
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    line-height: 1.53;
    list-style: none;
    margin-bottom: 0.875rem;
    position: relative; }
    ol li::before {
      color: #E30000;
      content: counter(list) ".";
      display: inline-block;
      font-weight: 700;
      margin-left: -1.625rem;
      width: 1.625rem; }
    ol li ol, ol li ul {
      margin: 1.375rem 0;
      padding-left: 1.875rem;
      counter-reset: list; }
      ol li ol li, ol li ul li {
        margin-bottom: 0;
        counter-increment: list; }
        ol li ol li::before, ol li ul li::before {
          content: counter(list, lower-alpha) ".";
          width: 1.375rem;
          margin-left: -20px; }

  padding-left: 1.125rem;
  list-style: none; }
  .content-viewport ol li,

    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    line-height: 1.53;

    margin-left: 0.625rem; }
    .content-viewport ol li::before,
    .content-viewport ul li::before {
      color: #E30000;
      display: inline-block;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 1;
      margin-left: -1.625rem;
      width: 1.625rem; }
    .content-viewport ol li ol,

      ol li ul,
      ul li ol,
      ul li ul {
        margin: 2.5rem 0; }
  blockquote, .quote {
    margin: 1.5625rem 20% 1.5625rem 0;
    padding: 0.75rem 0 0.75rem 1.875rem; } }

  background-color: #E7F4FF;
  margin: 2.25rem -0.75rem 0 -0.75rem;
  padding: 1.875rem 0.75rem; }

  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between; }

  align-items: center;
  border: 0 none;
  display: flex;
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0 0 0 3.25rem; }
  .video-language-selector__title::before {
    left: 0; }

.video-language-selector__toggle-button {
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 0 none;
  display: inline-block;
  margin-right: 0.75rem;
  min-width: auto;
  padding: 0;
  position: relative;
  width: inherit; }
  .video-language-selector__toggle-button:hover, .video-language-selector__toggle-button:focus {
    background-color: transparent; }
  .video-language-selector__toggle-button[aria-pressed="true"] .video-language-selector__button-text::after {
    transform: translateY(-50%) rotate(180deg); }

  color: #017DE5;
  font-size: 0.9375rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.58;
  padding-right: 0.875rem; }

    background-image: url("files/arrow-blue.svg");
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    content: '';
    height: 6px;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);

    width: 10px; }

  display: none; }
  .video-language-selector__container--is-active {
    display: block; }

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-top: 2.5rem; }

  padding: 0.625rem 0.625rem; }
  .video-language-selector__item--is-active {
    background-color: #ffffff; }

  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  line-height: 1;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px; }

    background-color: #686C71; }

  cursor: pointer;

  margin: 0;

  position: relative; }

    background-color: transparent;
    border-radius: 100%;

    left: 5px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 5px;
    width: 6px;
    z-index: 1; }

    border-radius: 100%;

    height: 16px;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 16px; }

  margin: 2.75rem 0 1.25rem; }
  .content-viewport .video__wrapper {
    box-shadow: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    height: 0;
    outline: 0 none;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding-bottom: 56.25%;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1; }
    .content-viewport .video__wrapper, .content-viewport .video__wrapper:hover, .content-viewport .video__wrapper:focus {
      border-bottom: 0 none;
      box-shadow: none; }
    .content-viewport .video__wrapper iframe {
      height: 100%;
      left: 0;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      width: 100%; }
    .content-viewport .video__wrapper img {
      left: 50%;
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
      width: 100%; }
  .content-viewport .video__holder, .content-viewport .video__text {
    flex-shrink: 0; }
  .content-viewport .video__caption {
    color: #383838;
    display: block;
    font-size: .6875rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin: .625rem 0 0; }
  .content-viewport .video__text {
    color: #383838;
    flex-grow: 1;
    line-height: 1.75; }

.play-button {
  display: inline-block;
  height: 100%;
  pointer-events: none;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1; }
  .play-button::after {
    border-bottom: 10px solid transparent;
    border-left: 12px solid #ffffff;
    border-top: 10px solid transparent;
    content: '';
    height: 0;
    position: absolute;
    right: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translate(70%, -50%);
    transition: .2s ease transform;
    width: 0; }
  .play-button::before {
    background-color: rgba(32, 32, 32, 0.4);
    border-radius: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 4px #ffffff;
    content: '';
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    height: 4.0625rem;
    left: 50%;
    pointer-events: all;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    transition: .2s ease transform;
    width: 4.0625rem; }
  .play-button:hover::after, .play-button:focus::after {
    transform: translate(70%, -50%) scale(1.1); }
  .play-button:hover::before, .play-button:focus::before {
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1); }

  .related-movie,
  button {
    display: none !important;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden !important; }

    position: relative; }
  .main-wrapper {
    margin: 0; }
  .hero__content,
  .hero__container,
  .article-content {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; }
  .article-content {
    border: 0 none; }
  .hero__container {
    padding: 1.25rem 0.75rem 1.875rem 0.75rem; }
  .article-intro {
    margin: 0; }
  .hero__content::after {
    content: none; }
  .hero__wrapper {
    height: auto;
    padding: 0; }
  .article-intro--introduction {
    margin: 0; }
  .helpful-summary__wrapper + .article-intro--introduction {
    margin: 0; }
  .asterix, .asterisk, .arrow, .lightbulb, .question, .howto, .pipQuote, .warning {
    background-color: white;
    border: none; }
  .articleUtilities .accordion__item:first-of-type {
    display: none;
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden; }
  .accordion__label {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #CFCFCf; }
  .accordion__target {
    display: block; }
  .header__container {
    border: 0 none; }
  .hero__intro-heading {
    margin: 0; }
  .hero__text-box {
    margin-top: 2.5rem; }
  @page {
    size: 21cm 29.7cm;
    margin: 2.5cm 2.5cm 2.5cm 2.5cm;
    mso-header-margin: 2.5cm;
    mso-footer-margin: 2.5cm;
    mso-paper-source: 0; }
  *,
  *::before,
  *::after {
    color: #000 !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
    text-shadow: none !important; }
  body {
    background: lightgrey !important; }
  a,
  a:visited {
    text-decoration: underline; }
  abbr[title]:after {
    content: " (" attr(title) ")"; }
  .content-viewport, .row {
    position: relative;
    overflow: visible;
    display: table;
    word-break: break-word; }
  .content-viewport a[href^=http]:after {
    content: " (" attr(href) ")"; }
  .ir a:after,
  a[href^="javascript:"]:after,
  a[href^="#"]:after {
    content: ""; }
  pre,
  blockquote {
    page-break-inside: avoid; }
  thead {
    display: table-header-group; }
  tr,
  img,
  p,
  img {
    page-break-inside: avoid; }
  ul {
    page-break-inside: auto; }
  img {
    max-width: 100% !important; }
  p,
  h2,
  h3 {
    orphans: 3;
    widows: 3; }
  h2,
  h3 {
    page-break-after: avoid !important; }
  /*
    --------------------
    2. CUSTOMISATION
    --------------------
    */
  html,
  body,
  .info,
  .accordion__label,
  .movie-summary__section--summary,
  .footer-container--copyrights {
    background-color: #FFF !important; }
  .hero--no-background {
    background-color: transparent !important; }

    min-width: 82px; }
  .info {
    border-bottom: none;
    border-top: none; }

    -webkit-print-color-adjust: exact !important;
    /* Chrome, Safari */
    color-adjust: exact !important;
    /*Firefox*/ } }
